YOUR ACCOUNT IS IN ARREARS Your Woolies card_name is in arrears, please make an immediate minimum payment of minimum_payment in order to continue shopping.\n\nFor assistance, call us on 0861 50 20 20
VALUED LOYAL Swipe your Woolies or MySchool card and get an extra 10\%% off selected items. Pay with your Woolies card and get a further 5\%%. Invitations to preview sales WRewards Green Free WMagazine Exclusive WRewards savings vouchers throughout the year Birthday savings voucher The WRewards year is calculated from the first Monday of each financial year of Woolworths which commences at the end of June or at the beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 (twelve) months later. Your spend updates are refreshed on the 12th day after each specified month end date. Your WRewards tier status is updated at the end of each month. STORES NEARBY WREWARDS RECENT SEARCHES GOOGLE MAPS
km Contact Us Cart Delivery Location SET DELIVERY LOCATION Previously Selected Locations Select your Province Select your Suburb Set your Delivery Location Sign Out Brands WHY WE NEED LOCATION SERVICES Location services allow us to provide store information like opening hours, contact details and directions. ENABLE LOCATION SERVICES OFF
TODAY PRODUCTS WREWARDS MY ACCOUNTS Increase Limit APPLY NOW The benefits: Shop anywhere Your Woolworths Credit Card is internationally recognised and accepted at 29 million merchants around the world, wherever you see the Visa sign. To qualify, you have to: Bring the following when you collect your Store Card: Cash when you need it: Funds within 48 hours Once your application has been approved the cash will be in your account within 48 hours. Easy access Withdraw funds 24/7 in the app using the personal loan withdrawal. WRewards gives you more As a Woolworths Store Cardholder, you’re automatically part of our WRewards programme. That means you’ll get exclusive access to great benefits and special offers on selected WRewards items. Make a difference Link your Store Card to our MySchool MyVillage MyPlanet fundraising programme and we\'ll donate up to 1% of the value of every Woolworths purchase you make to the organisation of your choice. You\'re in control With a Woolworths Store Card you decide how much you want to repay each month and your preferred payment method. Easy payment methods You could pay your account using one of the following methods: It’s Convenient f PLEASE ENTER THE AMOUNT YOU WOULD LIKE TO WITHDRAW: PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR LOAN\nREQUEST DETAILS: CALL US Local caller 0861 502 020 +27 21 411 5000 International caller Call Centre Operating Hours Daily 7.30am - 9pm email us Black Credit Card query Complaint Credit Card query WRewards query Insurance claim Payment query Store Card & Personal Loan query Technical 0860 100 987 +27 21 407 6137 Monday - Friday 8am - 7.30pm \n\nSaturday 8am - 5pm \n\nSunday 8am - 1pm \n\nPublic Holidays 8am - 5pm Monday - Friday 8am - 5.30pm \n\nSaturday 8am - 5pm \n\nSunday 9am - 1pm \n\nPublic Holidays 9am - 1pm Online shop registration /Login Delivery queries Order queries 0860 022 002 (021) 407 3995 +27 21 407 7002 Product query Store query 0861 502 050 +27 21 407 7003 Monday - Friday 8am - 5.30pm \n\nSaturday 8:30am - 2pm \n\nSunday 9am - 1pm \n\nPublic Holidays 9am - 1pm WRewards card WRewards loyalty vouchers Littleworld General Monday - Friday 8am - 5pm \n\nNo Weekends \n\nNo Public Holidays MySchool card General enquiries

The new Woolies app gives you easy access to fashion trends, recipes, stores, account information and so much more. See how much you’ve saved, track your tier status and access all your vouchers. Conveniently view your available funds, next payment due, recent transactions and so much more. Create a profile or use your existing Woolies online sign in to get started. Your sign in details will be the same on the app, mobi site and website. welcome WRewards at a glance Financial services GET STARTED km Search by Store or Location SKIP
continue cli-concluded CREDIT LIMIT INCREASE before we get started
Select your bank Other Expenses Monthly Credit Payments Maintenance Expenses Rental Payments Mortgage Payments Additional Monthly Income Net Monthly Income Gross Monthly Income YES No ACCOUNT TYPE LOADING… UNFORTUNATELY WE CANNOT PROCEED Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum Lorum ipsum GOT IT Gross monthly income refers to your income before deductions. Net monthly income refers to your income after deductions. Additional income refers to any income you receive apart from your monthly salary. Monthly mortgage or bond repayment refers to your home loan installments Rent is the cost of your monthly accommodation Maintenance expenses refer to your monthly obligation to pay for statutory child etc. Monthly Instalment of creditor account i.e: Credit Card, Personal Loan, Furniture Accounts etc. Other expenses refer to groceries, transport, costs etc. EMAIL SENT TO All fields are mandatory.\nIf not applicable, please enter R0.
UNFORTUNATELY WE CANNOT PROCEED We can only continue with your application once you’ve granted us permission to access your consumer credit information.
SORRY, WE CANNOT PROCEED WITH YOUR APPLICATION Unfortunately we can’t proceed until you no longer have any of these conditions in place.

We see that your Woolies Card is not yet linked. To see how much you\'ve saved, track your tier status and access all your vouchers, please link your Woolies Card now. LINK WOOLIES CARD JOIN WREWARDS Get more There are three tiers to WRewards - the more you spend, the more guaranteed rewards you\'ll enjoy. You\'ll start out on the Valued tier, and we\'ll upgrade your status automatically as you qualify for the next tier. To conveniently view your available funds, next payment due, recent transactions and so much more, please link your Woolies Card now. Get more back at Woolies Get up to 3\% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers when shopping at Woolies. Cash When You Need It Use your Woolworths Credit Card to draw cash at any ATM displaying the Visa logo, worldwide. Pay for Fuel Pay for your fuel with your Woolies Credit Card and get up to 1\% back in WRewards quarterly vouchers. PLUS (for Black Credit Card only) Free Taste magazine vouchers monthly 2 free coffee vouchers monthly that can be used at any Woolworths Cafe, To Go or Tapas Bar. Automatic VIP tier status for the first 12 months and free online delivery for Woolies online purchases (when you pay with your Woolies Black credit card). added to shopping list Your shopping list items can be found in Accounts view shopping list Store Card /Credit Card and Personal Loan General enquiries, Online, WRewards, MySchool Products and instore Woolworths online Website and App shopping woolworthsblack@wfs.co.za complaints@wfs.co.za creditcard@wfs.co.za creditcard@wfs.co.za insuranceclaims@wfs.co.za payments@wfs.co.za queries@wfs.co.za income@wfs.co.za queries@wfs.co.za Fax custserv@woolworths.co.za Technical problem shop@woolworths.co.za rewards@woolworths.co.za cs@myschool.co.za 0860 100 445 ingredients Savings Since The WRewards year is calculated from the first Monday of each financial year of Woolworths which commences at the end of June or at the beginning of July and comes to an end on the last Sunday of the Woolworths financial year 12 (twelve) months later. WRewards is our way of rewarding customers INSTANTLY. WRewards members save millions every week.

To continue please sign in or cancel to return to the rest of the app. sign in View Transactions View Statements Balance Protection Insurance Balance Protection Insurance Overview Featured and Benefits Submit a Claim Critical Illness/Death Cover/Retrenchment etc. Submit a Claim
select your claim reason Death Cover Pays the outstanding balance on your account Retrenchment Pays up to 12 months of installments from first day of retrenchment. Temporary Disability Pays up to 12 months of installments from the first day of disability
Permanent Disability Pays the outstanding balance on your account
Critical Illness Pays the outstanding balance on your account. In order to process your claim we will need the following documents. required forms YOU WILL ALSO NEED TO SUBMIT
Balance Protection Claim Form New Disability Claim Form Confidential Medical Specialist Report Medical Reports from Doctor Certified ID Investigation Results from Doctor Retrenchment Form Certified id Copy UI19 Form Certified Letter of Retrenchment from Employer Employee Declaration Form Sick Note from Doctor Personal Medical Attendants Report Boarding Letter from Employer balance insurance Get the documents Balance Insurance Overview
FEATURES AND BENEFITS Your peace of mind is important to us, so we offer you comprehensive balance protection on your Woolies Store Card, Credit Card or Personal Loan.
Comprehensive Balance Protection Your Comprehensive balance protection covers you in the event of death, retrenchment, critical illness, temporary and permanent disability. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death or permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months if you are retrenched or temporary disabled.
Additional Death Cover For an extra monthly premium of only R13.70 per month, you can also take out additional death benefit, which pays R20 000 to your next of kin in the event of your death, to help them handle unforeseen expenses.
Partner / Spouse Balance protection insurance for your spouse or partner can also be arranged. An additional monthly premium will be charged.
Withdraw Cash Now Debit Orders

Credit bureau We will try our best to ensure that you can afford the increased instalments of your new credit limit. As such we obtain your credit information from various credit bureaus, who maintains the personal details related to your credit history (repayment behaviour, amount of credit you have available, outstanding debt collections and other). Proof of income With credit applications, we may be required to verify your income. If so we may need 1 months payslip or bank statement.
Thanks for your application. Please check on the app to get regular updates as to your application progress. back to my account CONGRATULATIONS Your credit limit increase has been approved and is now available. Happy shopping! back to my account ### account type ### savings account
OOPS. SOMETHING WENT WRONG! Please try again. If the problem persists, call us on 0861 50 20 20 Check that your mobile data or WIFI is switched on and ensure that you’re connected to the internet. If the problem persists, call us on 0861 50 20 20 try again proof of income documents Take clear photos of your documents and email them to us at cliproofofincome@wfs.co.za. Your ID number will be your reference. Proof of income Requirements: In order to complete your application, we require your latest 1 months’ bank statements or last months payslips. Don’t have the required documents right now or need more detailed instructions? Simply click below and we will send an email to you, so you can complete the process documents sent to: Please follow the instructions we’ve sent to your email. If you didn’t receive the email, please check your spam folder. proceed complete Your credit limit increase is subject to the condition that proof of income is provided within 30 (thirty) days from the date of accepting the credit limit increase. Submission outside this period will result in the lapse of the offer.\n\nIf your proof of income is lower than the amount you disclosed, we will re-calculate your credit limit increase amount and notify you accordingly. You will only have access to the credit limit increase once proof of income is received. PROOF OF INCOME OOPS, TRY AGAIN. INCORRECT EMAIL FORMATTING

Overview Claim Covered not covered Balance Protection Cover in the event of your death, retrenchment, disability or a critical illness. Partner Cover Covers you in the event of your partners death, permanent disability or a critical illness. Additional Death Cover Helps pay for unforeseen expenses in the event of your death. Additional Death Cover for Partner Helps pay for unforeseen expenses in the event of your partners death.
Effective date Benefits how to claim
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled. All cover ceases at the age of 65, except death and critical illness.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) if your partner passes away, becomes permanently disabled, or is diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months starting from the date your partner is retrenched or temporarily disabled. All cover ceases at the age of 65, except death and a critical illness.
Pays R20 000 cash to a nominated beneficiary when you pass away. Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of your passing.
Pays R20 000 cash to you or a nominated beneficiary when your partner or spouse passes away. Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of the passing of your partner or spouse. •
Card Balance Protection Cover in the event of your death, retrenchments, disability or a critical illness.
Loan Balance Protection Cover in the event of your death, disability, retrenchment or a critical illness.
Companion Care Covers you in the event of your partners death.
Balance Protection (65+) Cover in the event of your death or a critical illness.
Partner Cover (65+) Covers you in the event of your partners death or a critical illness.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled. Pays R2500 cash to a nominated beneficiary when you pass away due to natural causes or R5000 cash if your passing is accidental. Helps your family handle any unforeseen expenses in the event of your passing.
Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, permanent disability, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays your instalments for up to 12 months from the date you are retrenched or temporarily disabled. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your partner’s death. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) if your partner passes away or if your partner is diagnosed with a critical illness. Pays the outstanding balance on your account (provided it is not in arrears) in the event of your death, or if you are diagnosed with a critical illness.> Filter Your Search Find your item faster using filters e.g. Country Road, size 10, vegetarian, organic, Carb Clever. View your latest vouchers and redeem them in-store before they expire. payments made from an absa account Electronic payments from another ABSA account can be made directly into your Woolworths Credit Card account. Use your 16-digit Woolworths Credit Card number as the bill account number. You can choose your preferred reference. Electronic payments from other bank account into your Woolworths credit card can be made into: payments made from other accounts Sorry, this document is unavailable Total Amount Due This is the sum of your current instalment, including any overdue amount and interest. Next Payment Due This is the date that the Total Amount Due is to be paid by. Current Balance This is the total amount currently owed to Woolies. Credit Limit This is the total amount of credit offered to you by Woolies Amount Overdue This is the shortfall amount that was not paid by the specified payment due date.
